DOC.brief_summary: The Torcetrapib project terminate December 2 , 2006 due safety finding . To assess safety efficacy fix combination torcetrapib/atorvastatin subject Fredrickson Type IV Hypertriglyceridemia .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing The Efficacy & Safety Of Torcetrapib/Atorvastatin And Atorvastatin In Subjects With High Triglycerides
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Fredrickson Type IV Hypertriglyceridemia Women pregnant lactating , plan become pregnant .
